Row.Text: Machiavelli's mastery of political manipulation and understanding of power makes him the ideal architect of the Illuminati's grand designs.
Ashoka's transformation from conqueror to enlightened ruler mirrors the Illuminati's pursuit of hidden wisdom and influence through peaceful means.
Lafayette's revolutionary ideals and secret society connections make him a perfect champion for the Illuminati's vision of a new world order.
Isabella's zealous pursuit of religious and political unity aligns with the Illuminati's desire to shape civilization from the shadows.
